content.json:
# AVD Storage Analytics & ANF Planning
## Comprehensive analysis of AVD storage performance, user patterns, and Azure NetApp Files sizing recommendations

### üìä This workbook provides:
- **Real-time Storage Performance Analysis** - IOPS, throughput, latency metrics
- **User Session Patterns** - Peak usage times, concurrent users, session duration
- **Profile Analytics** - FSLogix container sizes, growth trends, performance
- **ANF Sizing Recommendations** - Performance tier suggestions based on actual usage
- **Cost Optimization Insights** - Right-sizing recommendations and cost projections

---

parameters.name: TimeRange
parameters.label: Time Range
parameters.description: Select the time range for analysis

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.label: Log Analytics Workspace
parameters.description: Select the Log Analytics workspace containing AVD data
parameters.query:
Resources
| where type == 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| project id, name, subscriptionId, resourceGroup
| order by name asc

parameters.name: HostPools
parameters.label: Host Pools
parameters.description: Select specific host pools to analyze
parameters.query:
WVDConnections
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| distinct ResourceAlias
| sort by ResourceAlias asc

content.json:
## üìà Executive Summary Dashboard

Key performance indicators and quick insights for storage planning decisions.

content.query:
let timeRange = {TimeRange};
let hostPools = dynamic([{HostPools}]);
// Storage Performance Overview
Perf
| where TimeGenerated >= ago({TimeRange:grain})
| where CounterName in ("Disk Read Bytes/sec", "Disk Write Bytes/sec", "Current Disk Queue Length", "Avg. Disk sec/Read", "Avg. Disk sec/Write")
| where InstanceName != "_Total" and InstanceName !contains "Harddisk"
| extend DiskLetter = extract(@"([A-Z]):", 1, InstanceName)
| where DiskLetter in ("C", "D", "O", "P", "S", "T", "U", "V", "W", "X", "Y", "Z") // Common profile/data drives
| summarize 
    AvgReadThroughputMBps = avg(iff(CounterName == "Disk Read Bytes/sec", CounterValue / 1048576, 0)),
    AvgWriteThroughputMBps = avg(iff(CounterName == "Disk Write Bytes/sec", CounterValue / 1048576, 0)),
    PeakReadThroughputMBps = max(iff(CounterName == "Disk Read Bytes/sec", CounterValue / 1048576, 0)),
    PeakWriteThroughputMBps = max(iff(CounterName == "Disk Write Bytes/sec", CounterValue / 1048576, 0)),
    AvgQueueDepth = avg(iff(CounterName == "Current Disk Queue Length", CounterValue, 0)),
    AvgReadLatencyMs = avg(iff(CounterName == "Avg. Disk sec/Read", CounterValue * 1000, 0)),
    AvgWriteLatencyMs = avg(iff(CounterName == "Avg. Disk sec/Write", CounterValue * 1000, 0))
    by Computer, DiskLetter
| extend 
    TotalThroughputMBps = AvgReadThroughputMBps + AvgWriteThroughputMBps,
    PeakTotalThroughputMBps = PeakReadThroughputMBps + PeakWriteThroughputMBps,
    AvgLatencyMs = (AvgReadLatencyMs + AvgWriteLatencyMs) / 2
| summarize 
    TotalSessionHosts = dcount(Computer),
    AvgThroughputMBps = round(avg(TotalThroughputMBps), 1),
    PeakThroughputMBps = round(max(PeakTotalThroughputMBps), 1),
    AvgLatencyMs = round(avg(AvgLatencyMs), 2),
    MaxQueueDepth = round(max(AvgQueueDepth), 1)
| extend 
    ANFPerformanceTier = case(
        PeakThroughputMBps > 400, "Ultra",
        PeakThroughputMBps > 160, "Premium", 
        "Standard"
    ),
    StorageRecommendation = case(
        AvgLatencyMs > 20, "Consider Premium/Ultra ANF for lower latency",
        PeakThroughputMBps > 100, "Premium ANF recommended for throughput requirements",
        "Standard ANF may be sufficient"
    )
content.title: üéØ Storage Performance Summary

content.json:
## üë• User Session Analytics

Analyze user patterns, peak usage times, and session characteristics for capacity planning.

content.query:
// User Session Patterns and Peak Usage Analysis
let timeRange = {TimeRange};
Perf
| where TimeGenerated >= ago({TimeRange:grain})
| where CounterName == "Active Sessions"
| where ObjectName == "Terminal Services"
| summarize 
    ActiveSessions = avg(CounterValue),
    PeakSessions = max(CounterValue)
    by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| summarize 
    TotalSessionHosts = dcount(Computer),
    AvgConcurrentUsers = round(avg(ActiveSessions), 0),
    PeakConcurrentUsers = round(max(PeakSessions), 0),
    PeakHour = format_datetime(arg_max(TimeGenerated, PeakSessions), "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm")
    by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| extend 
    HourOfDay = datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated),
    DayOfWeek = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, "dddd")
| order by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: üìä Hourly User Session Patterns

content.query:
// Peak Usage Hours Analysis
Perf
| where TimeGenerated >= ago({TimeRange:grain})
| where CounterName == "Active Sessions"
| where ObjectName == "Terminal Services"
| extend HourOfDay = datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated)
| summarize 
    AvgSessions = avg(CounterValue),
    PeakSessions = max(CounterValue)
    by HourOfDay
| order by HourOfDay asc
| extend Hour = strcat(HourOfDay, ":00")
content.title: üïê Peak Usage Hours

content.query:
// User Profile Performance Analysis
Perf
| where TimeGenerated >= ago({TimeRange:grain})
| where CounterName in ("Profile loads", "Profile unloads")
| where ObjectName == "User Profile Service"
| summarize 
    ProfileLoads = sum(iff(CounterName == "Profile loads", CounterValue, 0)),
    ProfileUnloads = sum(iff(CounterName == "Profile unloads", CounterValue, 0))
    by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| summarize 
    TotalLoads = sum(ProfileLoads),
    TotalUnloads = sum(ProfileUnloads),
    AvgLoadsPerHour = round(avg(ProfileLoads), 1),
    PeakLoadsPerHour = max(ProfileLoads)
    by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| extend ProfileTurnover = round(TotalLoads * 1.0 / nullif(TotalUnloads, 0), 2)
| project TimeGenerated, TotalLoads, TotalUnloads, AvgLoadsPerHour, PeakLoadsPerHour
content.title: üë§ Profile Load/Unload Activity

content.json:
## üíæ Storage Performance Deep Dive

Detailed analysis of disk performance metrics to inform ANF sizing decisions.

content.query:
// Storage Performance Analysis - IOPS and Throughput
Perf
| where TimeGenerated >= ago({TimeRange:grain})
| where CounterName in ("Disk Reads/sec", "Disk Writes/sec", "Disk Read Bytes/sec", "Disk Write Bytes/sec")
| where InstanceName != "_Total" and InstanceName !contains "Harddisk"
| extend DiskLetter = extract(@"([A-Z]):", 1, InstanceName)
| where DiskLetter in ("C", "D", "O", "P", "S", "T", "U", "V", "W", "X", "Y", "Z")
| summarize 
    ReadIOPS = avg(iff(CounterName == "Disk Reads/sec", CounterValue, 0)),
    WriteIOPS = avg(iff(CounterName == "Disk Writes/sec", CounterValue, 0)),
    ReadThroughputMBps = avg(iff(CounterName == "Disk Read Bytes/sec", CounterValue / 1048576, 0)),
    WriteThroughputMBps = avg(iff(CounterName == "Disk Write Bytes/sec", CounterValue / 1048576, 0))
    by Computer, DiskLetter, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| extend 
    TotalIOPS = ReadIOPS + WriteIOPS,
    TotalThroughputMBps = ReadThroughputMBps + WriteThroughputMBps
| summarize 
    AvgIOPS = avg(TotalIOPS),
    PeakIOPS = max(TotalIOPS),
    AvgThroughputMBps = avg(TotalThroughputMBps),
    PeakThroughputMBps = max(TotalThroughputMBps)
    by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| order by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: üìà IOPS and Throughput Trends

content.query:
// Disk Latency Analysis
Perf
| where TimeGenerated >= ago({TimeRange:grain})
| where CounterName in ("Avg. Disk sec/Read", "Avg. Disk sec/Write")
| where InstanceName != "_Total" and InstanceName !contains "Harddisk"
| extend DiskLetter = extract(@"([A-Z]):", 1, InstanceName)
| where DiskLetter in ("C", "D", "O", "P", "S", "T", "U", "V", "W", "X", "Y", "Z")
| summarize 
    ReadLatencyMs = avg(iff(CounterName == "Avg. Disk sec/Read", CounterValue * 1000, 0)),
    WriteLatencyMs = avg(iff(CounterName == "Avg. Disk sec/Write", CounterValue * 1000, 0))
    by Computer, DiskLetter, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| extend AvgLatencyMs = (ReadLatencyMs + WriteLatencyMs) / 2
| summarize 
    AvgReadLatency = avg(ReadLatencyMs),
    AvgWriteLatency = avg(WriteLatencyMs),
    OverallAvgLatency = avg(AvgLatencyMs),
    MaxLatency = max(AvgLatencyMs)
    by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| order by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: ‚ö° Disk Latency Analysis

content.query:
// Queue Depth Analysis
Perf
| where TimeGenerated >= ago({TimeRange:grain})
| where CounterName == "Current Disk Queue Length"
| where InstanceName != "_Total" and InstanceName !contains "Harddisk"
| extend DiskLetter = extract(@"([A-Z]):", 1, InstanceName)
| where DiskLetter in ("C", "D", "O", "P", "S", "T", "U", "V", "W", "X", "Y", "Z")
| summarize 
    AvgQueueDepth = avg(CounterValue),
    MaxQueueDepth = max(CounterValue),
    P95QueueDepth = percentile(CounterValue, 95)
    by Computer, DiskLetter, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| summarize 
    OverallAvgQueueDepth = avg(AvgQueueDepth),
    OverallMaxQueueDepth = max(MaxQueueDepth),
    OverallP95QueueDepth = avg(P95QueueDepth)
    by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| order by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: üìä Disk Queue Depth

content.json:
## üéØ ANF Sizing Recommendations

Based on observed performance patterns, here are the recommended Azure NetApp Files configurations.

content.query:
// ANF Sizing Recommendations based on performance data
let timeRange = {TimeRange};
let anfRecommendations = 
Perf
| where TimeGenerated >= ago({TimeRange:grain})
| where CounterName in ("Disk Read Bytes/sec", "Disk Write Bytes/sec", "Disk Reads/sec", "Disk Writes/sec", "Avg. Disk sec/Read", "Avg. Disk sec/Write", "Current Disk Queue Length")
| where InstanceName != "_Total" and InstanceName !contains "Harddisk"
| extend DiskLetter = extract(@"([A-Z]):", 1, InstanceName)
| where DiskLetter in ("C", "D", "O", "P", "S", "T", "U", "V", "W", "X", "Y", "Z")
| summarize 
    ReadThroughputMBps = avg(iff(CounterName == "Disk Read Bytes/sec", CounterValue / 1048576, 0)),
    WriteThroughputMBps = avg(iff(CounterName == "Disk Write Bytes/sec", CounterValue / 1048576, 0)),
    ReadIOPS = avg(iff(CounterName == "Disk Reads/sec", CounterValue, 0)),
    WriteIOPS = avg(iff(CounterName == "Disk Writes/sec", CounterValue, 0)),
    ReadLatencyMs = avg(iff(CounterName == "Avg. Disk sec/Read", CounterValue * 1000, 0)),
    WriteLatencyMs = avg(iff(CounterName == "Avg. Disk sec/Write", CounterValue * 1000, 0)),
    AvgQueueDepth = avg(iff(CounterName == "Current Disk Queue Length", CounterValue, 0))
    by Computer, DiskLetter
| extend 
    TotalThroughputMBps = ReadThroughputMBps + WriteThroughputMBps,
    TotalIOPS = ReadIOPS + WriteIOPS,
    AvgLatencyMs = (ReadLatencyMs + WriteLatencyMs) / 2
| summarize 
    SessionHosts = dcount(Computer),
    AvgThroughputMBps = round(avg(TotalThroughputMBps), 1),
    PeakThroughputMBps = round(max(TotalThroughputMBps), 1),
    AvgIOPS = round(avg(TotalIOPS), 0),
    PeakIOPS = round(max(TotalIOPS), 0),
    AvgLatencyMs = round(avg(AvgLatencyMs), 2),
    MaxQueueDepth = round(max(AvgQueueDepth), 1)
| extend 
    // ANF Performance Tier Recommendation
    RecommendedTier = case(
        PeakThroughputMBps > 400 or PeakIOPS > 40000 or AvgLatencyMs > 20, "Ultra",
        PeakThroughputMBps > 160 or PeakIOPS > 16000 or AvgLatencyMs > 10, "Premium",
        "Standard"
    ),
    // Capacity Recommendation (with 30% growth buffer)
    RecommendedCapacityTB = case(
        RecommendedTier == "Ultra", round((PeakThroughputMBps * 1.3) / 128, 1), // Ultra: 128 MiB/s per TiB
        RecommendedTier == "Premium", round((PeakThroughputMBps * 1.3) / 64, 1), // Premium: 64 MiB/s per TiB  
        round((PeakThroughputMBps * 1.3) / 16, 1) // Standard: 16 MiB/s per TiB
    ),
    // Minimum capacity based on tier
    MinCapacityTB = case(
        RecommendedTier == "Ultra", 4.0,
        RecommendedTier == "Premium", 4.0,
        4.0
    ),
    // Cost estimation (rough monthly costs)
    EstimatedMonthlyCostUSD = case(
        RecommendedTier == "Ultra", round(max_of(RecommendedCapacityTB, 4.0) * 1024 * 0.000694 * 730, 0), // $0.000694/GiB/hour
        RecommendedTier == "Premium", round(max_of(RecommendedCapacityTB, 4.0) * 1024 * 0.000347 * 730, 0), // $0.000347/GiB/hour
        round(max_of(RecommendedCapacityTB, 4.0) * 1024 * 0.000181 * 730, 0) // $0.000181/GiB/hour
    )
| extend 
    FinalCapacityTB = round(max_of(RecommendedCapacityTB, MinCapacityTB), 1),
    PerformanceCharacteristics = strcat(
        "Max Throughput: ", PeakThroughputMBps, " MB/s, ",
        "Max IOPS: ", PeakIOPS, ", ",
        "Avg Latency: ", AvgLatencyMs, " ms"
    ),
    Recommendation = strcat(
        "ANF ", RecommendedTier, " tier - ", FinalCapacityTB, " TiB capacity"
    )
| project 
    ["Session Hosts"] = SessionHosts,
    ["Performance Tier"] = RecommendedTier,
    ["Recommended Capacity (TiB)"] = FinalCapacityTB,
    ["Peak Throughput (MB/s)"] = PeakThroughputMBps,
    ["Peak IOPS"] = PeakIOPS,
    ["Avg Latency (ms)"] = AvgLatencyMs,
    ["Est. Monthly Cost (USD)"] = EstimatedMonthlyCostUSD,
    ["Full Recommendation"] = Recommendation;
anfRecommendations
content.title: üí∞ ANF Sizing & Cost Recommendations

content.json:
## üìä System Resource Utilization

Monitor CPU, Memory, and Network utilization to ensure balanced resource allocation.

content.query:
// CPU and Memory Utilization
Perf
| where TimeGenerated >= ago({TimeRange:grain})
| where CounterName in ("% Processor Time", "Available MBytes", "% Committed Bytes In Use")
| summarize 
    AvgCpuUsage = avg(iff(CounterName == "% Processor Time", CounterValue, 0)),
    AvgMemoryAvailableMB = avg(iff(CounterName == "Available MBytes", CounterValue, 0)),
    AvgMemoryUsagePercent = avg(iff(CounterName == "% Committed Bytes In Use", CounterValue, 0))
    by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| summarize 
    AvgCpuUsage = avg(AvgCpuUsage),
    AvgMemoryAvailableMB = avg(AvgMemoryAvailableMB),
    AvgMemoryUsagePercent = avg(AvgMemoryUsagePercent)
    by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| order by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: üíª CPU & Memory Utilization

content.query:
// Network Utilization
Perf
| where TimeGenerated >= ago({TimeRange:grain})
| where CounterName == "Bytes Total/sec"
| where ObjectName == "Network Interface"
| where InstanceName !contains "Loopback" and InstanceName !contains "isatap" and InstanceName !contains "Teredo"
| summarize 
    NetworkThroughputMBps = avg(CounterValue / 1048576)
    by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| summarize 
    AvgNetworkThroughputMBps = avg(NetworkThroughputMBps),
    PeakNetworkThroughputMBps = max(NetworkThroughputMBps)
    by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| order by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: üåê Network Utilization

content.json:
## üìã Key Insights & Action Items

Based on the performance data analysis, here are the key recommendations for your AVD storage strategy.

content.query:
// Key Insights and Recommendations Summary
let timeRange = {TimeRange};
let insights = 
Perf
| where TimeGenerated >= ago({TimeRange:grain})
| where CounterName in ("Disk Read Bytes/sec", "Disk Write Bytes/sec", "Avg. Disk sec/Read", "Avg. Disk sec/Write", "Active Sessions")
| summarize 
    AvgThroughputMBps = round(avg(iff(CounterName in ("Disk Read Bytes/sec", "Disk Write Bytes/sec"), CounterValue / 1048576, 0)), 1),
    AvgLatencyMs = round(avg(iff(CounterName in ("Avg. Disk sec/Read", "Avg. Disk sec/Write"), CounterValue * 1000, 0)), 2),
    PeakUsers = round(max(iff(CounterName == "Active Sessions", CounterValue, 0)), 0)
| extend 
    PerformanceScore = case(
        AvgLatencyMs < 5, "Excellent",
        AvgLatencyMs < 15, "Good", 
        "Needs Improvement"
    ),
    StorageRecommendation = case(
        AvgThroughputMBps > 200, "Consider Ultra ANF for high throughput workloads",
        AvgThroughputMBps > 80, "Premium ANF recommended for balanced performance/cost",
        "Standard ANF should meet current requirements"
    ),
    LatencyRecommendation = case(
        AvgLatencyMs > 20, "High latency detected - Ultra ANF strongly recommended",
        AvgLatencyMs > 10, "Moderate latency - Premium ANF recommended",
        "Current latency is acceptable"
    ),
    ScalingInsight = case(
        PeakUsers > 50, "High user density - ensure sufficient ANF capacity for concurrent access",
        PeakUsers > 20, "Moderate user density - monitor capacity during peak hours",
        "Current user density is manageable"
    )
| project 
    ["Metric"] = "Current Performance",
    ["Avg Throughput (MB/s)"] = AvgThroughputMBps,
    ["Avg Latency (ms)"] = AvgLatencyMs,
    ["Peak Users"] = PeakUsers,
    ["Performance Score"] = PerformanceScore,
    ["Storage Recommendation"] = StorageRecommendation,
    ["Latency Recommendation"] = LatencyRecommendation,
    ["Scaling Insight"] = ScalingInsight;
insights
union
(
datatable(["Metric"] : string, ["Avg Throughput (MB/s)"] : real, ["Avg Latency (ms)"] : real, ["Peak Users"] : real, 
          ["Performance Score"] : string, ["Storage Recommendation"] : string, ["Latency Recommendation"] : string, ["Scaling Insight"] : string) [
    "Best Practices", 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, "Reference", "Right-size ANF capacity based on peak throughput + 30% buffer", "Monitor latency trends and adjust tier if needed", "Plan for 20-30% user growth in ANF capacity planning"
]
)
content.title: üéØ Executive Summary & Action Items

content.json:
---

## üìö ANF Performance Tier Reference

| **Tier** | **Throughput per TiB** | **Max IOPS per TiB** | **Typical Use Cases** | **Starting Price/TiB/Month** |
|-----------|------------------------|----------------------|----------------------|-------------------------------|
| **Standard** | 16 MiB/s | 320 | General file shares, light workloads | ~$135 |
| **Premium** | 64 MiB/s | 1,280 | AVD profiles, moderate I/O workloads | ~$260 |
| **Ultra** | 128 MiB/s | 2,560 | High-performance workloads, databases | ~$520 |

*Minimum capacity: 4 TiB per volume | Prices are estimates and may vary by region*

### üîç How to Use This Workbook:
1. **Start with the Executive Summary** to get quick insights
2. **Review User Session Analytics** to understand peak usage patterns
3. **Analyze Storage Performance** metrics to identify bottlenecks
4. **Use ANF Recommendations** to size your Azure NetApp Files deployment
5. **Monitor System Resources** to ensure balanced performance

### üìä Data Collection Notes:
- Performance data is collected every minute from AVD session hosts
- Recommendations include a 30% capacity buffer for growth
- Cost estimates are based on standard Azure pricing (actual costs may vary)
- For production deployments, monitor for at least 2-4 weeks to capture usage patterns
